title: Time-changed Feller's Brownian motions are birth-death processes
abstract:
The main result of this paper demonstrates that every Feller's Brownian
motion, specifically, the Brownian motion with general boundary conditions as
examined by Ito and McKean, can be transformed into a birth-death process
through a time-change. Additionally, we have derived the parameters of the
birth-death processes in terms of those associated with Feller's Brownian
motion.
